turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Diedre, I want to get some Starbucks on my way to work. Can you arrange a pickup order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Which store?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in Penn Station. Near 34th street, the one near the Amtrak waiting line.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing. What'd you like to get?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a Blonde Flat White.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I'm gonna go with a Tall.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good. What type of milk do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What types do they offer?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Whole, soy, almond, coconut, 2 percent, and nonfat.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Definitely gonna go with the coconut milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. Want any food with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, the food always makes me queasy.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any flavors or sweeteners?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. Just a standard tall Blonde Flat White?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good. It's going to be $5.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Just hook it up to my account.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good. The order is confirmed. They're making your coffee right now, just head to the Amtrak Starbucks in Penn Station to grab it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!
